thread.title: Chili’s Restaurant Announces They Will Give A Percentage Of Their Revenue To Planned Parenthood — UPDATE — Restaurant Retreats!
thread.title_full: Chili’s Restaurant Announces They Will Give A Percentage Of Their Revenue To Planned Parenthood — UPDATE — Restaurant Retreats!

author: V Saxena
title: Chili’s Restaurant Announces They Will Give A Percentage Of Their Revenue To Planned Parenthood — UPDATE — Restaurant Retreats!
text:
UNREAL: Church Won’t Mention Trump by Name in Prayers for Fear of “Triggering” Attendees 
Here’s an example of the backlash: Why NOT to eat at Chili's & why this was taken down, but a fellow fb member snapped a screen shot. @Chilis supports #PlannedParenthood pic.twitter.com/iLlrSVXOet 
This promotion, which had reportedly been scheduled to run from Jan. 1 to March 31, has since been cancelled, and Chili’s has released a statement expressing disapproval of the local franchises’ actions. Advertisement - story continues below 
“While our franchise partner had the best intentions, we have received growing feedback and concern from community members regarding the Give Back Event,” the company wrote to Fox News. “This feedback does not reflect Chili’s focus on bringing communities together and the event was never intended to be viewed as a partisan event or political statement. Therefore we, along with our franchise partner, have decided to cancel the event.” 
There was just one problem: This was not the first time a Chili’s franchise had been busted funneling donations to Planned Parenthood . 
According to Life News , six years ago a Chili’s restaurant in California tried to host a fundraiser for Planned Parenthood. Thanks to complaints from local pro-life advocates, however, the event was eventually cancelled. 
It would behoove Chili’s to tread very lightly in the future, because as the classic song says, “For it’s one, two, three strikes, you’re out.” Advertisement - story continues below
